title: #MemoryMetrics.v1_1_2.MemoryMetrics

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ClearCurrentPeriod.description: This sets the CurrentPeriod object values to zero.
ClearCurrentPeriod.longDescription: This action shall set the CurrentPeriod object property values to zero.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

UncorrectableECCError.longDescription: The value of this property shall be true if the uncorrectable error threshold alarm trip was detected.
UncorrectableECCError.description: Uncorrectable data error threshold crossing alarm trip detected status.

AddressParityError.longDescription: The value of this property shall be true if an Address Parity Error was detected which could not be corrected by retry.

SpareBlock.longDescription: The value of this property shall be true if the spare block capacity crossing alarm trip was detected.
SpareBlock.description: Spare block capacity crossing alarm trip detected status.

Temperature.longDescription: The value of this property shall be true if a temperature threshold alarm trip was detected.
Temperature.description: Temperature threshold crossing alarm trip detected status.

CorrectableECCError.longDescription: The value of this property shall be true if the correctable error threshold crossing alarm trip was detected.
CorrectableECCError.description: Correctable data error threshold crossing alarm trip detected status.

AlarmTrips.description: Alarm trip information about the memory.
AlarmTrips.longDescription: This type shall contain properties describing the types of alarms that have been raised by the memory.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

LifeTime.longDescription: This object shall contain properties which describe the LifeTime metrics for the current resource.
LifeTime.description: This object contains the Memory metrics for the lifetime of the Memory.

CurrentPeriod.longDescription: This object shall contain properties which describe the CurrentPeriod metrics for the current resource.
CurrentPeriod.description: This object contains the Memory metrics since last reset or ClearCurrentPeriod action.

Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.
Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.

BlockSizeBytes.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the block size in bytes of all stucture elements.

HealthData.longDescription: This object shall contain properties which describe the HealthData metrics for the current resource.
HealthData.description: This object describes the health information of the memory.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

MemoryMetrics.description: MemoryMetrics contains usage and health statistics for a single Memory module or device instance.
MemoryMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the Memory Metrics for a single Memory device in a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

RemainingSpareBlockPercentage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the remaining spare blocks in percentage.

AlarmTrips.longDescription: This object shall contain properties describe the types of alarms that have been raised by the memory.
AlarmTrips.description: Alarm trip information about the memory.

PerformanceDegraded.longDescription: The value of this property shall be performance degraded mode status, with true indicating perfomance degraded.

LastShutdownSuccess.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the status ofthe  last shutdown, with true indicating success.

PredictedMediaLifeLeftPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain an indicator of the percentage of life remaining in the media.
PredictedMediaLifeLeftPercent.description: The percentage of reads and writes that are predicted to still be available for the media.

DataLossDetected.longDescription: The value of this property shall be data loss detection status, with true indicating data loss detected.

HealthData.description: This type describes the health information of the memory.
HealthData.longDescription: This type shall contain properties which describe the HealthData metrics for the current resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BlocksWritten.longDescription: The value of this property shall be mumber of blocks written since reset.
BlocksWritten.description: Number of blocks written since reset.

BlocksRead.longDescription: The value of this property shall be number of blocks read since reset.
BlocksRead.description: Number of blocks read since reset.

CurrentPeriod.description: This object contains the Memory metrics since last reset or ClearCurrentPeriod action.
CurrentPeriod.longDescription: This type shall describe the metrics of the memory since last time the ClearCurrentPeriod Action was performed or the system reset.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BlocksWritten.longDescription: The value of this property shall be number of blocks written for the lifetime of the Memory.
BlocksWritten.description: Number of blocks written for the lifetime of the Memory.

BlocksRead.longDescription: The value of this property shall be number of blocks read for the lifetime of the Memory.
BlocksRead.description: Number of blocks read for the lifetime of the Memory.

LifeTime.description: This object contains the Memory metrics for the lifetime of the Memory.
LifeTime.longDescription: This type shall describe the metrics of the memory since manufacturing.
